data.name: Parasight: Chlorophyll worms
data.detailed_description:
Check out more games

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1411740/Urbek_City_Builder/


Check out more games

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1894570/Parasight_Prologue/


Check out more games

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1829310/Corsairs_Madness/


About the Game


Parasight is a 2D Action-RPG game with souls-like mechanisms, in Parasight you can choose to play peacefully or aggressively, you can socialize with enemies or fight with them!

Gameplay


The style used in the game is souls-like. You can choose to be a Knight, Wizard, or etc.
Level up, using ENERGY EXTRACTS to become stronger in dealing with the enemies.
You can choose between various weapons, armours, rings, and many more!
Your actions will have consequences!
You can choose to play peacefully or tempestuous.
Explore the vast Bonrham cities to find out what happened to the world and its citizens. There are also different side stories in the game.

Features:



  • You can choose to play peacefully or aggressively!
  • Choose between 6 classes of Knight, Mage, and some more! (only 2 classes are available in the demo)
  • Dynamic story.
  • Rich story & richer side stories!
  • Cool puzzles and mini-games!
  • Many cute NPCs.
  • Original Art and soundtrack


*The game is in the alpha stage and currently is under development, some of the features are not available in the demo.
*The final product may vary from the demo. (Your feedbacks are a crucial part of the changes.)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core Proccessors
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Anyrhing
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad Core Proccessors
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Anyrhing
